hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
mv JOB-prepare-binaries-master/workspace/{cbmc,goto-cc,goto-instrument} .
export BUILDPLACE=/srv/jenkins-slave/cow sudo cowbuilder --update --aptcache /srv/jenkins-slave/aptcache --basepath /srv/sid-base.cow
if ! file `readlink -f /srv/sid-base.cow/usr/bin/gcc` | grep -q "Bourne-Again shell script" ; then echo "gcc is not a script, update may have replaced gcc" exit 1 fi
if ! file /srv/sid-base.cow/usr/bin/ld.bfd | grep -q "Bourne-Again shell script" ; then echo "ld is not a script, update may have replaced ld" exit 1 fi
cp goto-cc /srv/sid-base.cow/usr/bin/goto-cc cp goto-cc /srv/sid-base.cow/usr/bin/goto-ld
if [ ! -f mole-0.2.tar.gz ] ; then wget http://diy.inria.fr/mole/mole-0.2.tar.gz tar xzf mole-0.2.tar.gz mole-0.2/goto-instrument-git mv mole-0.2/goto-instrument-git . fi
if [ ! -f z3 ] ; then wget 'http://download-codeplex.sec.s-msft.com/Download/Release?ProjectName=z3&DownloadId=868844&FileTime=130482359193930000&Build=20919' -O z3.zip unzip z3.zip mv z3-*/bin/z3 . fi
